data.name: Waiting List
data.author: Stephen Walker ( http://www.itwebexperts.com )
data.description:
Waiting list is to allow guests/customers to add themselves to a list to be notified when a product in is stock again, this script is run via a cron script.

Cron Script Location
http://mydomain.com/path/to/catalog/waitingList/notify/cron.php
